ota.summary: Hello 2026! This Release adds an update to that should reduce latency for all devices. see (https://github.com/esphome/esphome/pull/12135) Consider updating Z-Wave devices and Dual Radio to use the Experimental build which use the new Z-Wave Proxy component in ESPHome. It has been stable in my testing for several months now. The last release's notes had directions on setting up: https://github.com/tube0013/TubesZB-ESPHome-Builder/releases/tag/2025.10.27.2_redo4 New in EFR32-MG24 Firmware - selectable Baud Rate and Custom URL entry for firmware - so you can now easily flash Nerivec's FW releases: https://github.com/Nerivec/silabs-firmware-builder/releases **Be sure to match your module version to the firmware version** _Silicon Labs MGM224 Module:_ ... _RF-STAR BM MGM24 Module:_ Stopping ZHA or Z2M is recommended before flashing, the Serial Stream Server will pause during flashing but it's safer to just stop the host integration. Adjust the buadrate for the updated speed to match the new firmware, paste the URL for the GBL and push the Flash_EFR32 button. The MD5 check will fail but that is expected for custom url flashing. following the flash completion press the Probe_EFR32 button and it should update the Current FW sensor to the new version. **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tube0013/TubesZB-ESPHome-Builder/compare/2025.10.27.2_redo4...2026.02.23
